overview: Dan, is on the wrong path, drinking, quitting school and fighting with his father. One night this path takes him somewhere he has not been before - a wild garden with a wind chime. He meets Eno, a young boy, who behaves strangely, and annoys him. But somehow Dan keeps coming back, and finally realizes why. Shot in the aftermath of the April 2014 floods in Honiara, this story of loss and resilience reminds us that what is broken can still sing.
title: Broken Wind Chime
